feedback_text: Love the new export feature! Makes my workflow so much faster.
App crashes every time I try to upload a file. Very frustrating.
Can't figure out how to share documents with my team. Documentation is unclear.
Pricing is too high for small teams. Would recommend a middle tier.
Would love dark mode! I work late at night and the bright interface hurts my eyes.
Switched to Competitor X because they have API access. Miss some features but API was essential.
Best tool in the market! Customer support is exceptional.
Onboarding was confusing. Had no idea what to do after signing up.
Export to PDF works but quality is poor. Text looks blurry.
Mobile app is missing key features. Can't do half the things I can on desktop.
